reviewText: The police drama has defects but I seem to keep watching it. Since LA Confidential, I have been following James Elroy. This was one of the earlier directorial work of David Ayer (Training Day). If you like Dark Blue (Kurt Russell), you'll like this one. Looking forward to more David Ayer-James Elroy cop films.
very poor story line, poor acting, implausible ending with way too many loose ends. waste of time!!!
